parameter.name: encodingType
parameter.description: Encode the response and specifies the encoding method to use.

parameter.name: maxUploads
parameter.description: Number of uploads that can be returned in a response.

parameter.name: keyMarker
parameter.description: Specifies the multipart upload after which listing should begin.

parameter.name: prefix
parameter.description: Lists in-progress uploads only for those keys that begin with the specified prefix.

parameter.name: uploadIdMarker
parameter.description: Specifies the multipart upload after which listing should begin.
